item.title: Pre-internet businesses were tough
item.description: One of my favorite podcasts is NPR’s How I Built This that conducts interviews with entrepreneurs across a variety of industries, not just tech. A recent episode was an interview with Judi Sheppard Misset, the creator of Jazzercise - a dance fitness class that she launched in 1969. We all realize that there’s much less friction to launch a business these days but the interview makes you see how significant the changes have been.
